//settings Ringtone Silent Billing Subscription Upload the videos when wifi is available Upload Quality Specify video quality for uploads Notifications Choose notification sound About Sesyme is a co-learning application for university students built for the purpose to help students with their study-related questions and create an environment where students from different universities can co-learn, collaborate and share knowledge. 1.0.0 Got any queries? We are happy to help! Send Feedback FAQ View frequently asked questions http://www.sefnet.co.za/terms&conditions.php Edit Delete Report Hide this post Search Likes Questions Answers Click to verify your Email We will respond via email to feedback and questions. You may also send feedback to all@innet.co.za> Please choose a Category Post Question Answer Comment Post Image Type your Question Provide more details Feedback You Can Browse Answers And See How Other People Tackle Questions, Put Their Perspective On Same Interest/Topics. ACQUIRE KNOWLEDGE READ YOUR E-BOOKS ASK QUESTIONS To Make Your Learning Experience Easier And Fun.You Want Someone On Standby To Answer Your Questions Whenever You Encounter Challenges.

CO-LEARNING PLATFORM https sesyme.com Cancel Share Be the first to reply Request Call Was this answer helpful? Yes No Like Reply 0 replies Error Loading Image Write something about yourself save Personal Details Name and Surname Staff Number About Version Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Manage Notifications Edited Create Profile Information: 
When you create an account and profile on Sesyme Application, we collect your full name, academic details and other information you provide, such as interests. Your name, photo,affiliation,University and course and any other information that you choose to add to your public-facing profile will be available for viewing to users of the Sesyme Application. Once you create a profile, other users will be able to see in your profile certain information about your activity on the Sesyme Application, such as the questions and answers you post, categories of interest to you, the information you list as credentials, and your edits to Your posts. #Data Collection: We collect and store the information and content that you post to the Sesyme Application, including your questions, answers, photos, and comments. Your Content, date and time stamps, and all associated comments are publicly viewable on the Sesyme Application, along with your full name.

Feedback Records:
When you communicate with us (via email, through the Sesyme Application, or otherwise), we may maintain a record of your communication. 

Integrated Service Provider and Linked Networks: 
You can elect to sign in or sign up to the Sesyme Application through a linked network (i.e.Google). If you elect to sign up through or connect a Linked Network, we receive certain profile and account information about you from the Linked Network.The specific information provided to us by Linked Networks is determined by these third parties and may vary by network. In all cases, the permissions page for the Linked Network will describe the information being shared. You should consult their respective privacy policies for information about their practices. 

Automatically Collected Information About Your Activity: 
We use tracking technologies to automatically collect information about your activities, such as your searches, date and time of your visit, and other information about your use of the Sesyme Application.We also collect and may store information that your mobile device provides to us in connection with your use of the Sesyme Application such as your mobile device,unique device identifier. We also receive information when you view content on or otherwise interact with the Sesyme Application. Loadingâ€¦ What would you like to attach?
